name: Underground Fire Service Checklist (V140421)
WorkSafe notification prior to trenching operations @ 15M deep or greater
Existing in-ground services located and verified before excavation
Site survey and confirm extent of works
Confirm area of work is accessable and acceptable to commence
Exclusion zone erected
Trench shoring/shield is on site
Excavation depths and locations confirmed prior to detailed excavation commencing
Bedding material is correct type, grade and depth
Fire service installed to correct depth of cover
Service indicator tape installed
joints are correct
Risers are in correct location - provide photos
Fire service tested to AS/NZS35002018, AS24192017 Provide Photos
Trench suitably backfilled and compacted
Expansion lagging installed around pipes prior to concrete
clean up of work area
Completion sign off
Independent inspection and testing complete
General photos, comments & observations during Cold Water Rough-In (Add below)
Underground Fire Service completed to specification/drawings & Area left clean/tidy
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
